00126 typedef struct pmip_entry_t {
00127     struct in6_addr mn_prefix;  /* Network Address Prefix for MN */
00128     struct in6_addr our_addr;   /* Address to which we got BU */
00129     struct in6_addr mn_suffix;     /* MN IID */
00130     struct in6_addr mn_hw_address; /* MAC ADDR */
00131     struct in6_addr mn_addr;    /* Full MN Address */
00132     struct in6_addr mn_serv_mag_addr;   /* Serving MAG Address */
00133     struct in6_addr mn_serv_lma_addr;
00134     struct in6_addr mn_link_local_addr; /* Link Local Address  for MN */
00135     struct timespec add_time;   /* When was the binding added or modified */
00136     struct timespec lifetime;   /* lifetime sent in this BU, in seconds */
00137     uint16_t seqno_in;      /* sequence number for response messages */
00138     uint16_t seqno_out;     /* sequence number for created messages */
00139     uint16_t PBU_flags;     /* PBU flags */
00140     uint8_t PBA_flags;      /* PBA flags */
00141     int type;           /* Entry type */
00142     int unreach;        /* ICMP dest unreach count */
00143     int tunnel;         /* Tunnel interface index */
00144     int link;           /* Home link interface index */
00145 /* PBU/PBRR message for retransmissions */
00146     struct iovec mh_vec[7];
00147     int iovlen;
00148 /* info_block status flags */
00149     uint8_t status;
00150     ip6ts_t timestamp;
00151     uint32_t msg_event;
00152 /* Following fields are for internal use only */
00153     struct timespec br_lastsent;    /* BR ratelimit */
00154     int br_count;       /* BR ratelimit */
00155     int n_rets_counter;     /* Counter for N retransmissions before deleting the entry */
00156     pthread_rwlock_t lock;  /* Protects the entry */
00157     struct tq_elem tqe;     /* Timer queue entry for expire */
00158     void (*cleanup) (struct pmip_entry_t * bce);    /* Clean up bce data */
00159 } pmip_entry_t;
